    Conferences and Events

    I very much enjoy the opportunity to speak at conferences and events. As such, in case you are near by, come see me at one of my talks!

    • Open Infrastructure Summit Virtual, (October 19, 2020)
    • Red Hat Forum Germany, (January 14, 2020)
    • Ansible Roadshow Frankfurt Germany, (June 25, 2019)
    • OpenShift Cloud Native Night Munich Germany, (February 21, 2019)
    • Open Infrastructure Meetup Munich Germany, (February 12, 2019)
    • Ludwig Maximilians University Munich Germany, (February 1, 2019)
    • Red Hat Forum Munich Germany, (January 15, 2019)
    • OpenStack Summit Berlin Germany, (Nov 15, 2018)
    • Ansible Meetup Munich Germany, (May 15, 2018)
    • Red Hat Summit San Francisco USA, (May 7th 2018)
    • Internet World Expo Munich Germany, (March 6 2018)
    • Red Hat Forum Vienna Austria, (October 24, 2017)
    • OpenStack Meetup Munich Germany,@Stylight (July 19, 2016)
    • Kubernetes Meetup Munich Germany, (September 19, 2016)
    • OpenStack Summit Barcelona Spain, (October 25 2016 3:05 - 3:45)
    • iX Cloud and OpenStack Day Cologne Germany, (November 15, 2016)
